entry.title: Skip The Germs Antibacterial Hand Soap Flip Top Bottle (450 ml)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skip The Germs
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 5.52

[shortdesc]

IN STOCK NOW

Benzalkonium Chloride is a Health Canada and FDA approved, wide spectrum antibacterial compound that is an effective sanitizing agent. Benzalkonium Chloride works by killing microorganisms and inhibiting their future growth and for this reason, it has become the main ingredient approved for use in the most effective alcohol-free hand sanitizers and wipes.

Benzalkonium Chloride sanitizers provide an array of benefits. First, they are just as effective in killing germs as alcohol-based sanitizer, while being much easier on the hands. Another benefit is the extended protection that Benzalkonium Chloride provides. Unlike alcohol-based products, Benzalkonium Chloride based products kill bacteria and continue to provide protection well after the solution has dried.

Benzalkonium Chloride based sanitizers also pose much less threat in cases of accidental ingestion and are low fire hazard making them ideal for household consumption.

  • Health Canada/FDA Approved
  • Kills harmful bacteria and moistens hands

Manufacturer Part Number:  54369-003-1

Warnings:

  • For external use only
  • When using this product, avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water
  • Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation develops
  • Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, call a poison control centre or get medical help right away
  • Do not use if you are allergic to any of these ingredients

[/shortdesc]

Product Information:

Active Ingredients:

Benzalkonium Chloride  0.13% Purpose - Antimicrobial

 

Inactive Ingredients:

Aqua/Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Decyl Glucoside, Glyceryn, Citric acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, Methylchloroisothiazolinone and Methylisothiazolinone, CI 19140, CI 42090, Parfum

entry.title: Skip The Germs Alcohol-Free, Antibacterial, Hand-Sanitizing Lotion - Flip Top Bottle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skip The Germs
Type: Hand Sanitizer
Price: 8.33

[shortdesc]

IN STOCK NOW

Benzalkonium Chloride is a Health Canada and FDA approved, wide spectrum antibacterial compound that is an effective sanitizing agent. Benzalkonium Chloride works by killing microorganisms and inhibiting their future growth and for this reason, it has become the main ingredient approved for use in the most effective alcohol-free hand sanitizers and wipes.

Benzalkonium Chloride sanitizers provide an array of benefits. First, they are just as effective in killing germs as alcohol-based sanitizer, while being much easier on the hands. Another benefit is the extended protection that Benzalkonium Chloride provides. Unlike alcohol-based products, Benzalkonium Chloride based products kill bacteria and continue to provide protection well after the solution has dried.

Benzalkonium Chloride based sanitizers also pose much less threat in cases of accidental ingestion and are low fire hazard making them ideal for household consumption.

Alcohol based sanitizers, while effective in killing germs, also dry out your hands from essential oils your skin requires. In fact, regular use of alcohol based sanitizers will dry out your hands to the point where skin will crack and provide an easy route of entry for any pathogens. 

The addition of moisturizing agents to the formula ensures your hands not only remain soft and supple, but also ensures lasting protection on your hands.  

  • Health Canada/FDA Approved
  • Benzalkonium Chloride
  • Kills harmful bacteria and moistens hands

Manufacturer Part Number:  5439-001-007

Warnings:

  • For external use only
  • When using this product, do not use in or near the eyes. In case of contact, rinse eyes thoroughly with water
  • Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation or rash appears and lasts
  • Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away

[/shortdesc]

 Product Information:

 

Active Ingredients:

Benzalkonium Chloride  0.1% Purpose - Antimicrobial

Inactive Ingredients:

Aqua /Water, Glyceryl Stearate (and) PEG 100 Stearate , Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil , Caprylic Capric Triglycerides , Glycerin , Cetyl alcohol , Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Sodium Polyacrylate (and) C13 14 Isoparaffin (and) Laureth 7, Allantoin , Disodium EDTA, Dimethicone , Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate ,Butylated Hydrxytoluene , Lavandula Angustifolia , Matricaria Recutita Chamomile ) Extract , Silk Amino Acids ,Panthenol

3M Breathe Easy Hood, BE-10-3, white, regular

    Line Breathe Easy
    Origin Country United States

  • The blower unit can be mounted on the waist, face, or head, depending on the sy

    • Product Information

  • Lightweight
  • Comfortable
  • Can be used for a variety of applications
  • Constant flow of air can provide cooling for the worker, resulting in greater comfort for the wearer
  • Loose-fitting headgear options provide respiratory protection without the need for a tight faceseal or fit testing
  • Battery-powered blower pulls the air through the filter resulting in no additional breathing resistance to the wearer

    • Suggested Application

  • Double bib hood
  • US OSHA APF of 1000
